  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600

    LayoutSVGHiddenContainer {defs} at (0,0) size 0x0
      LayoutSVGResourceClipper {clipPath} [id="clip1"] [clipPathUnits=userSpaceOnUse]

      [feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="5.00, 1.00"]
        [SourceGraphic]
